articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Pyongyang Airport
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Pyongyang Airport
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to Pyongyang Airport.
					 In August last year leader Kim Jong Il stressed the need to rebuild the airport on a modern basis and make good preparations for the project before undertaking the construction of Terminal 1 in full scale. He said that the project should be completed on the occasion of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un went round the outside and inside of newly built Terminal 1. 
					
					 Covering more than 1 729 square meters, the terminal is capable of giving best service to passengers. 
					
					 He expressed big satisfaction over the fact that soldier-builders completed the project in a short span of time. 
					
					 He watched with deep attention the building covered mainly with glasses and partly with trimmed granite and ground stones and the platform with trimmed granite stones. He highly appreciated the peculiar Korean-style roof. 
					
					 Watching the walls of the main lobby and corridor decorated with large artificial stones, their floors with tiles and their ceilings with raised parts for lighting, he said the overall construction was done splendidly. 
					
					 He dropped in at every room having chandeliers of beads, round chandeliers and direct lighting lamps. 
					
					 He was briefed on Terminal 2 to be constructed before giving an important instruction for building the airport as required by the new century. 
					
					 He stressed the need to arrange waiting hall linked with the boarding gateways for convenience of passengers so that departures and arrivals may not overlap. 
					
					 Watching a lay-out for Terminal 2, he said that it is better to distinguish the ground floor from the first floor, when viewed, so that its peculiarity may be preserved and look fashionable and overcome the monotonous look. He corrected the shortcomings of the design. 
					
					 He underlined the need to spruce up Sunan area as befitting a gate to the capital city of Pyongyang and a satellite city while building Pyongyang Airport well. 
					
					 He said the airport should have its appearance as an airport of the socialist country in contents and architectural style as required by the accommodating capacity because it should provide both international and domestic air service. 
					
					 He also stressed the need to successfully build the airport having terminals and facilities for safe and correct landing and take-off of planes and a control tower commanding the airport area. 
					
					 Pyongyang Airport should be constructed on the best level as it is a monumental edifice for all ages, he said, underscoring the need to ensure the quality in the project. 
					
					 He looked round passenger plane No. 633 and historical plane No. 535 used by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 He got aboard plane No. 633 to learn about the technical feature and operation of the plane. 
					
					 Then he got aboard plane No. 535 and gave an instruction for preservation, management and operation of the plane.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Outgoing Swedish Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Outgoing Swedish Ambassador 
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, had a talk with Barbro Elm, Swedish ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a farewell call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Felicitates President of Comoros on Independence Day
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Felicitates President of Comoros on Independence Day
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Ikililou Dhoinine, president of Comoros, on Thursday on the occasion of the 37th anniversary of its independence.
					 Kim in the message hoped that the friendly people of Comoros would achieve progress and prosperity, expressing conviction that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would steadily develop.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Malawi
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Malawi
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Joyce Banda, president of Malawi, on the 48th anniversary of its independence.
					 Kim in his message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, wishing the president and people of Malawi successes in their efforts for the stability and development of the country.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Venezuelan President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Venezuelan President
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Hugo Chavez Frias, president of the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela, on its independence day.
					 Reaffirming the invariable solidarity of the Korean people with the Venezuelan people in their just cause for protecting national independence and sovereignty and achieving the country's independent development and prosperity, Kim in the message heartily wished the president good health and greater success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Congratulates PM of Equatorial Guinea
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Congratulates PM of Equatorial Guinea 
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim in a message on Wednesday congratulated Vicente Ehate Tomi on his appointment as prime minister of Equatorial Guinea.
					 Choe in the message sincerely wished the prime minister great success in his work for achieving the country's socio-economic development.
					
					 DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a similar message on the same day to Agapito Mba Mokuy upon his appointment as minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation of Equatorial Guinea.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Greets Venezuelan FM
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Greets Venezuelan FM
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Thursday sent a message of greeting to Nicolas Maduro Moros, foreign minister of People's Power of Venezuela, on its independence day.
					 The message wished him success in his work for developing the country's foreign relations, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would steadily grow by joint efforts.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Congratulates FM of Lesotho
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Congratulates FM of Lesotho
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun on Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Mohlabi Kenneth Tsekoa on her reappointment as foreign minister of the Kingdom of Lesotho.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two counties would continue to develop, the message wished her fresh success in her work.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group's Human Rights Abuses against DPRK Residents Censured
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group's Human Rights Abuses against DPRK Residents Censured
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the DPRK Red Cross Society Thursday issued a statement denouncing the south Korean puppet group for its base allurement and abduction operations and human rights abuses against DPRK residents.
					 He termed them monstrous inhuman acts, barbarities in the 21st century and hideous human rights abuses of illegal political gangsters.
					
					 Referring to what DPRK woman Pak Jong Suk said, when interviewed by Korean and foreign reporters in Pyongyang some days ago upon returning home, the spokesman said: Pak was taken away by agents of its puppet group to south Korea but was disillusioned with south Korea. 
					
					 The testimony made by Pak at the press conference was an expression of her anger and resentment at the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors which has committed inhuman crimes by abusing kinship for its sinister political purpose. 
					
					 All Koreans, people of conscience and Red Cross workers of the world are greatly astonished by the disclosure of the Lee group's above-said crimes and brand them as unimaginable terror against people, slave trade of modern version and piracy in the 21st century.
					
					  The recently disclosed criminal acts of the puppet group are nothing but a tip of iceberg.
					
					 Its allurement and abduction of DPRK residents are a blatant encroachment upon its sovereignty and a grave provocation against it.
					
					 It is only the group of gangsters such as the Lee Myung Bak group who are strutting about in other country in this era of high civilization and make no scruple of alluring and abducting people in broad daylight, treating them like slaves and using them for their sinister political purpose.
					
					 The puppet group should stop at once such criminal acts and apologize for them. It should send back all the abductees to the north. If it persists in its allurement and abduction operations, it will have to pay dearly for this and will be held wholly accountable for it.
					
					 The unbiased world public, the United Nations Commission on Human Rights, international Red Cross organizations and human rights organizations and parties concerned should pay due attention to the puppet group's vicious allurement and abduction operations and human rights abuses against DPRK residents, bitterly denounce them and never pardon the group's criminal moves.
					
					 If those who were deceived and taken away to south Korea by the puppet group return home after repenting of their wrongdoings, the DPRK will embrace them with deep care anytime and give them an ample opportunity of rebirth.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Mulling Concluding Military Agreement with Japan
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Mulling Concluding Military Agreement with Japan
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the National Peace Committee of Korea issued a statement on Thursday branding the south Korean authorities' racket for concluding a military agreement with Japan as a replica of the conclusion of the "Ulsa (1905) Five-point Treaty", which reduced Korea to a complete colony of the Japanese imperialists.
					 Terming it an unpardonable treachery such as paving a way for Japanese militarists to stage a come back to Korea and turn again this land into a theater of rowdyism for aggressors, the statement continues:
					
					 The puppet group's conclusion of a military agreement with Japanese reactionaries is tantamount to soothing over the unpardonable crimes committed by Japan against the Korean nation in the past.
					
					 What is more serious is that the conclusion has been speeded up in accordance with the U.S. imperialists' ambition to invade the DPRK and further maintain its hegemony in Northeast Asia and at its positive instigation.
					
					 If the military agreements including the conclusion of the General Security of Military Information Agreement (GSOMIA) between the puppet forces of south Korea and Japan are concluded, they would help round off the triangular military alliance for aggression the U.S. has long dreamed of and turn south Korea into a double colony of the U.S. and Japan and an outpost of aggression.
					
					 They would, at the same time, give Japan which is waiting for a chance for reinvasion with its outdated pipedream "Greater east Asia co-prosperity sphere" a legal guarantee for open participation in the moves to ignite a nuclear war to invade the DPRK.
					
					 It is the way of thinking of the Lee Myung Bak group to get in touch with the Korean nation's sworn enemy and leave the whole land to the tender mercy of the Japanese militarist aggressors if it is helpful to doing harm to fellow countrymen.
					
					 The situation of the Korean Peninsula reminds one of the eve of a war and the regional peace and security are facing a serious challenge as the puppet group of traitors take an active part in the moves to establish the triangular military alliance, an Asian-version of NATO, and a missile shield for aggression while toeing the U.S. strategy for dominating Asia.
					
					 The reality proves that not only the Korean people but also the Asian people can never evade holocaust of a nuclear war as long as the Lee group sycophant towards the U.S. and Japan hell bent on provoking an anti-DPRK war, selling the dignity and interests of the nation to its U.S. and Japanese masters.

articles.title: Ro Su Hui Goes Back to S. Korea via Panmunjom
articles.content:
Ro Su Hui Goes Back to S. Korea via Panmunjom 
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, (Pomminryon) went back to south Korea across the demarcation line in Panmunjom on Thursday. Ro had come to the DPRK on March 24 to take part in commemorations for the 100th day since the demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Officials of the DPRK accompanied him to Panmunjom to see him off. Among them were Choe Jin Su, chairman of the North Headquarters of Pomminryon, and officials of the North Headquarters of Pomminryon and the Pan-national Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification and the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration.
					
					 People, including youth and students, in Kaesong city thronged Panmunjom to give Ro a hearty send-off.
					
					 As Ro arrived in the yard of Panmun Pavilion, the crowd warmly greeted him, waving Korean Peninsula flags.
					
					 A girl student presented him with a bunch of flowers.
					
					 Ro said good-bye to the officials of the DPRK.
					
					 At 3 p.m. he crossed the demarcation line with a strong resolution and with the Korean Peninsula flag in hand. South Korean men in plain clothes hurriedly took him away.
					
					 The farewell-bidders shouted slogans "Down with Lee Myung Bak group of traitors!", "Let Mr. Ro Su Hui go home!" and "U.S. and south Korean conservative authorities must halt at once such human rights abuse as blocking Vice-Chairman Ro Su Hui!"
					
					 The courageous visit paid by Ro to the north to participate in the above-said commemorations and contribute to the cause of reunification recorded an unforgettable event in the history of the national reunification movement.

articles.title: Pyongyang Citizens Warmly See off Ro Su Hui
articles.content:
Pyongyang Citizens Warmly See off Ro Su Hui
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang citizens warmly saw off Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon).
					 A farewell meeting for him was held before the Three Charters for National Reunification Memorial Tower on Thursday.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					Choe Jin Su, chairman of the North Headquarters of Pomminryon, said the North Headquarters would positively support the just struggle of the people from all walks of life in the south in the future, too and go hand in hand with the South Headquarters of Pomminryon along the road of implementing the north-south joint declaration.
					
					 Vice-Chairman of the South Headquarters Ro Su Hui said it is the due courtesy and obligation as a member of the Korean nation to mourn the demise of Kim Jong Il in the humblest manner, adding during his sojourn in Pyongyang he grasped the truth why the people in the north call great men who believed in people as in Heaven fatherly leaders.
					
					 He expressed his fixed will to glorify his life as a pro-reunification champion remembered by the nation who contributes to fully demonstrating the spirit of Pomminryon despite the ever-more violent fascist racket against reunification. 
					
					 A woman worker presented a bouquet to him.
					
					 As songs "Korea Is One" and "We Are One" blared, he with Korean Peninsula flag in his hand left for Panmunjom, receiving warm farewell of the citizens in Pyongyang.

articles.title: DPRK Woman Interviewed upon Her Return Home (6)
articles.content:
DPRK Woman Interviewed upon Her Return Home (6) 
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- DPRK woman Pak Jong Suk was interviewed by Korean and foreign reporters on June 28.
					 Referring to her feelings after coming back to the DPRK, she said as follows:
					
					 A single misstep made me fall into a bottomless pitfall. But my motherland injected life-giving water to me who might have become a forlorn wandering spirit.
					
					 When I deplaned, quieting my thumping heart, I was stunned by the cordial reception given by officials concerned.
					
					 Had I been handcuffed, I would not have found any word to say. 
					
					 That night I thought and thought, looking up at the starry sky over Pyongyang. 
					
					 I felt at that time how affectionate and great the motherland is for me. I would have no more to desire in the world before I die.
					
					 Until that time I could not imagine what profound loving care awaited me. 
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un did not blame me who did so many wrongs in the past but brought me under his warm care. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un made sure that I, little different from an offender, reside in Pyongyang with my son who is a teacher at Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory and daughter-in-law.
					
					 I am an ingrate who had betrayed my motherland to seek better living while others devoted themselves to building a thriving nation, tightening their belts.
					
					 I visited the statues of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill to express thanks to Kim Jong Un who helped me to be reborn.
					
					 I atoned for my wrong doings and renewed my pledge to uphold Kim Jong Un with my pure conscience by showing intense loyalty to the Generalissimos though I failed to do so in the past. 
					
					 The world does not know such tender-hearted leader as the dear respected General Kim Jong Un.
					
					 I was reborn thanks to Kim Jong Un identical to the great Generalissimos.

articles.title: Visits
articles.content:
Visits 
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Union of Architects of Korea headed by its Vice-Chairman Sim Yong Hak left Pyongyang on July 5 to visit Mongolia.
					 A delegation of the International Union of Agricultural and Foodstuff Workers led by its Secretary General Julien Huck left here this day.

articles.title: Plan for Cooperation Signed between DPRK and Vietnam
articles.content:
Plan for Cooperation Signed between DPRK, Vietnam
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- A plan for cooperation in the fields of standardization, measurement and product quality control for 2012-2013 was signed between the DPRK State Commission of Quality Control and the Vietnamese Directorate for Standards and Quality in Hanoi on Tuesday.
					 Present at the signing ceremony from the DPRK side were members of the delegation of the State Commission of Quality Control of the DPRK led by Chairman Choe Kwang Rae and the economic and commercial councilor of the DPRK embassy in Hanoi and from the Vietnamese side Ngo Quy Viet, director general of the Directorate for Standards and Quality, and officials concerned.
					
					 It was inked by Choe Kwang Rae and Ngo Quy Viet.

articles.title: Agricultural Workers Vow to Remain Loyal to Leadership of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Agricultural Workers Vow to Remain Loyal to Leadership of Kim Jong Un
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- An oath-taking meeting of agricultural workers took place in Okdo-ri, Ryonggang County, Nampho City on Thursday on the occasion of the 18th anniversary of the demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that the President built on this land a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence, with his rare ideological and theoretical activities and energetic leadership and laid a foundation for the prosperity of all generations to come.
					
					 They can never forget the image of the tender-hearted President, who put forward the farmers as masters of the country and land and taught them methods of farming while frequently visiting farms without taking a rest, they noted.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il demonstrated the dignity and might of Juche Korea and wisely led the people of the DPRK to dynamically advance along the road of a thriving nation bearing in mind the honor of being members of the Kim Il Sung's nation, they said.
					
					 They expressed their firm resolution to remain true to the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un with the belief that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are always with them.
					
					 They called for doing farming well as required by the Juche farming methods true to the Workers' Party of Korea's policy of bringing about a turn in agriculture and thus increase per hectare yield and attain the goal of grain production for this year without fail.

articles.title: Remembrance Concert of School Youth and Children Held
articles.content:
Remembrance Concert of School Youth and Children Held
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Remembrance concert of youth and schoolchildren "Song of Eternal Sun" took place at the Central Youth Hall on Thursday on the occasion of the 18th anniversary of the demise of President Kim Il Sung.  
					 The concert started with narration and chorus "Sea of Strong Yearning".
					
					 Put on the stage were numbers of diverse genres such as reminiscences-based agitation and song, "Star of Korea", an immortal revolutionary hymn, and female solo "We Live in the Embrace of the Leader".
					
					 The performers praised the feats of the President, who embarked on the road of the revolution in his early years, liberated Korea by waging hard-fought anti-Japanese struggle and built the socialist country of Juche where people live in happiness.
					
					 The numbers expressed the unshakable will to hold in high esteem the great Generalissimos for all ages and carry forward and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche started in Mt. Paektu, true to the Songun leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Among the audience were Ri Yong Su, department director of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the C.C., the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, officials concerned and school youth and children in the city of Pyongyang.

articles.title: Moving to New Houses Goes On in Changjon Street
articles.content:
Moving to New Houses Goes On in Changjon Street
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Moving to new houses is going on in Changjon Street, Pyongyang.
					 In the DPRK modern dwelling houses are offered to ordinary citizens, including blue and white collar workers, free of charge.
					
					 One of the newcomers to the street, Sin Chol Gwon, who is a worker at the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex, told KCNA:
					
					 "This is the third time for my family to move to new houses for over 10 years.
					
					 Therefore, my children's birthplaces are all different. My eldest son was born in Jangchung-dong No.1 in Songyo District and the second son in Sinri-dong, Tongdaewon District. My daughter was born in Mangyongdae District in Juche 97 (2008). And my wife is now pregnant again."
					
					 His wife Pak Un Jong said:
					
					 "People would say that my husband and I are lucky in housing.
					
					 But we owe the luck to our social system that values the workers so much.
					
					 When we got married, the country was in hard time, the period of 'Arduous March'. But the State gave us, a discharged soldier-turned-worker couple, a house and better ones again afterwards.
					
					 My fourth child will be born here in Changjon Street, which was built under the loving care of leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un for the people.
					
					 My children's birth certificates represent the benefits we have received from our socialist system."

articles.title: Full-length Novel on Kim Jong Il Sees Light in DPRK
articles.content:
Full-length Novel on Kim Jong Il Sees Light in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- A full-length novel "Eternal History" of cycle of novels "Immortal Guidance" saw light in the DPRK.
					 The novel deals with the touching world of noble loyalty and moral obligation of leader Kim Jong Il who successfully realized the cause of perpetuating the memory of President Kim Il Sung for the first time in history.
					
					 The novel shows the Korean people weathering out all sorts of hardships in the mid-1990s while trying to overcome the grief over the loss of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, regarding him as a soldier of the President, declined to accept the top post and honor which the era and people presented to him but held the President in high esteem. Thanks to his noble virtue and moral obligation the history of the sun was given continuity in this land.
					
					 Through the portrayal of various characters the novel shows the pure mental world of all the servicepersons and people who entrusted their destiny to Kim Jong Il and remained true to his leadership.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Revered by World People
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Revered by World People
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- All the Korean people are missing President Kim Il Sung so much with the anniversary of his demise (July 8) approaching.
					 In his lifetime the President enjoyed deep respect from people across the world for his great personality.
					
					 In June Juche 64 (1975) Kim Il Sung visited Bulgaria. Guided by the then first secretary of the C.C., the Bulgarian Communist Party, he toured a wheat field of a local farm.
					
					 Peeling off wheat spike, he asked the chief engineer of the farm how much fertilizer it applied per hectare.
					
					 Being told that the farm gave 80 kg of nitrogenous fertilizer per hectare, the President said the ripe wheat proved that the soil was very fertile.
					
					 When the first secretary said that the farming in his country had been badly affected by the cold front, the President told him that it was ascribable to iceberg in the Arctic zone. Then he introduced the farming methods applied in the DPRK, like introducing humus-potted maize seedlings and cold-bed rice seedlings, sowing the right crop on the right soil at the right time and improving swamps.
					
					 The first secretary expressed admiration at the President's ample knowledge of agriculture, saying that he seemed to be a veteran peasant.
					
					 The President told him that a state leader has to acquire rich knowledge of all fields in order to manage the state affairs.
					
					 The first secretary and officials of Bulgaria were deeply touched by his remarks.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Opening New Phase of Independent Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Opening New Phase of Independent Reunification
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday dedicates an editorial to the 40th anniversary of the July 4 Joint Statement. The editorial calls on all Koreans in the north and south and abroad to open a new phase of independent reunification on the basis of the Three Principles of National Reunification, true to the idea and guidance of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					 It was thanks to the energetic leadership of President Kim Il Sung that high-level political talks were held between the north and the south, the Three Principles of National Reunification were proclaimed and a north-south joint statement was made public on July 4, 1972.
					
					 The three principles the keynote of which is independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity provided guidelines for solving the issue of the country's reunification by the nation itself in conformity with its will and interests.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il provided the historic June 15 joint declaration and October 4 declaration based on the Three Principles of National Reunification. That was an event of special significance in putting the cause of national reunification on a new higher stage, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 Steadfast are the stand and will of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government to reunify the country on the three principles no matter how frequently the situation and circumstances may change.
					
					 All Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should regard the idea of "By our nation itself", basic spirit of inter-Korean declarations, as the motto of their life and struggle, and fully apply it in the effort for national reunification.
					
					 They should resolutely reject and shatter the U.S. imperialists' vicious hostile policy toward the DPRK and all their moves to invade it and realize their ambition for domination at the sacrifice of the Korean nation.
					
					 The editorial calls on all patriotic-minded progressive forces to achieve solidarity and alliance irrespective of faction, affiliation and ism and deal a sledge-hammer blow at the conservative forces against reunification in their moves to stay in power and thus open a new heyday of national unity.

articles.title: Songun Policy Is Mighty Treasured Sword for Final Victory: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Songun Policy Is Mighty Treasured Sword for Final Victory: Rodong Sinmun 
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun on July 5 dedicates a bylined article to the 11th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "Songun Policy of Our Party Is Mighty Political Mode of Socialism".
					 It says:
					
					 The eternal victory and prosperity of DPRK-style socialism are guaranteed by Songun politics pursued by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Over the past eleven years since the work was published, the political and military might of the DPRK was remarkably bolstered up and the country ranked itself among the countries that are possessed of nuclear weapons and manufactured and launched satellites.
					
					 The Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea is the most mighty, advantageous basic political mode under socialism.
					
					 As Kim Jong Il pursued the Songun policy in all fields with the army as a main force of revolution, the People's Army could creditably guarantee DPRK-style socialism, playing the role of reliable scout and strong pillar of the Songun revolution.
					
					 Songun policy is an advantageous political mode which helps consolidate the army-people unity in every way and build a thriving socialist state by dint of the unity.
					
					 The DPRK has fully demonstrated its might as an impregnable socialist fortress as its army and people have the same idea and spirit of struggle and it is firmly based on the army-people unity.
					
					 The Songun policy is a mighty political mode that smashes anti-socialist moves of the imperialists by making the atmosphere of giving priority to military affairs pervade whole society.
					
					 Thanks to the intensified all-people and nation-wide defense system, the whole country has turned into an impregnable fortress and the number of the revolutionary soldiers' families is on the steady increase. This is the true picture of the DPRK.

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses Lee Myung Bak of Inciting Confrontation
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses Lee Myung Bak of Inciting Confrontation
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea during his recent visits to Central and South American countries said south Korea would "not allow any provocation by the north" but take "severe punishment". Citing "the provocation from the north," he let loose such rigmarole that "the goal is to realize unification by preserving peace and making cooperation." He went the lengths of hurling mud at the opposition parties and democratic forces of south Korea, talking about "the forces following the north."
					 Minju Joson Thursday in a bylined commentary observes in this regard:
					
					 The reckless remarks of traitor Lee are just rubbish of a confrontation maniac who seeks inciting confrontation not only against the compatriots in the north but also opposition parties and democratic forces in the south.
					
					 "Provocation by the north" is often uttered by the traitor.
					
					 His talk about "unification by preserving peace and making cooperation" is a sheer lie. "Peace", "cooperation" and "unification" traitor Lee ballyhooed about abroad are nothing but a cunning trick to hide his true colors as an anti-reunification maniac and repair his tattered image.
					
					 What can not be overlooked is that Lee openly talked about "the forces following the north" even abroad, which drew criticism even at home. Now the people from all walks of life and opposition parties in south Korea are calling for "eliminating the forces kowtowing to the U.S. and Japan" to stand up against the Lee group's racket of "eliminating the forces following the north." Lee's talk about "forces following the north" against this backdrop is just an artifice to divert elsewhere the public indignation against him.
					
					 It is shame on the south Korean people and the nation that such a disgusting human scum as Lee is still allowed to stay in power and tour the world under the pretext of "summit" and the like.
					
					 It is the urgent task of the Korean nation to throw overboard traitor Lee at an early date.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts Last-Ditch Efforts of Traitor Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts Last-Ditch Efforts of Traitor Lee Myung Bak
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea is making last-ditch efforts to fan up the atmosphere of confrontation with compatriots.
					 At a meeting held at Chongwadae on July 3, he grumbled about non-existent "provocation" from the north and cried out for "severely retaliating against it."
					
					 Shortly ago, he made similar trumpeting at a "commemoration of the tenth anniversary of the second Yonphyong naval skirmish."
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that traitor Lee more dead than alive as a politician is letting loose a cascade of invective almost every day as part of the anti-DPRK smear campaign, crying out for "counter-action." 
					
					 This is nothing but a petty trick to kick up an unusual whirlwind of confrontation with compatriots in a bid to divert elsewhere the public attention and escape the nation's severe judgment. 
					
					  This is, at the same time, an unpardonable political and military provocation to achieve "unification under liberal democracy" at any cost by staying in power and persistently pursuing the policy of confrontation. 
					
					  The Lee group of traitors is finding itself in such miserable position that it may face punishment due to its crimes committed against the nation.
					
					  The Lee group attempted to conclude the General Security of Military Information Agreement with Japan in secret in a bid to stifle compatriots only to be disclosed to public. Consequently, the group is hit hard from all sides. 
					
					 Moreover, fresh crimes of the group are being disclosed one after another almost every day with the day drawing near when it will face the people's judgment. This is throwing the rat-like Lee group into utter uneasiness and horror.
					
					  Precisely for this reason, the group is becoming more desperate in the anti-DPRK confrontation hysteria than ever before, seeking a way for its survival and the realization of the ambition for achieving "unification of the social systems" in escalating the confrontation with compatriots.
					
					 The Lee group is the worst confrontation maniac.
					
					 The south Korean people are denouncing and cursing the group of traitors for having driven the inter-Korean relations to acute confrontation and the brink of war phase and calling for the return of the June 15 era in which the nation was overcome with the joy over good prospect of reunification.
					
					 The Lee group would be well advised to face up to the trend of the times and behave itself.
					
					  Only a shameful fiasco and a miserable fate await those who persist in the confrontation moves despite the DPRK's repeated warnings.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Assails Moves to Round Off U.S.-Japan-S. Korea Military Alliance
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Assails Moves to Round Off U.S.-Japan-S. Korea Military Alliance 
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The issue of the conclusion of a military agreement between south Korea and Japan has become a focus of international public attention.
					 The issue including the matter of concluding the General Security of Military Information Agreement was brought up for discussion for the first time since the end of World War II.
					
					 For the conclusion of the agreement they ostensively put up the signboards of "preserving peace" and conducting "exchange" but they seek other aims through their military agreement.
					
					 This is, in fact, part of the moves to round off the triangular military alliance involving the U.S., Japan and south Korea.
					
					 The U.S.-Japan-south Korea system for military cooperation in the past was the U.S.-led two way vertical one. The U.S. laid down a foundation for the triangular military alliance by concluding the "mutual defence treaty" with south Korea and the "security treaty" with Japan.
					
					 Early in 2008 the U.S. laid down the guidelines calling on the U.S., Japan and south Korea to "take joint military counter-actions" in case they "face security threats" while talking about the "offensive to pressurize north Korea through triangular cooperation". It set up the "tripartite coordination committee" made up of "government" authorities and high-ranking officials of military and military research institutions and agreed to knock into shape the military cooperation system.
					
					 On this basis, the U.S. has strongly pushed for military cooperation between south Korea and Japan. It was aimed to complete the triangular military alliance earlier than scheduled.
					
					 The conclusion of the south Korea-Japan military agreement would help the U.S. troops and the Japanese "Self-Defence Forces" (SDF) emerge main forces of aggression within the framework of the above-said alliance with the puppet forces in "contingency" on the Korean Peninsula. It would, at the same time, help justify the SDF's advance into the peninsula.
					
					 The peninsula is now in the danger of falling victim to the U.S. Asia strategy and being reduced to a gambling site for big powers.
					
					 The triangular military alliance means an infrastructure of the U.S. strategy for world domination.
					
					 "Return to Asia" declared by the U.S. is becoming a reality thanks to the U.S. moves to tighten the alliance and build a missile shield.
					
					 It is the intention of the U.S. to put the tripartite joint military exercises on a regular basis every year after rounding off the institutional elements of the alliance in a bid to examine the efficiency of the alliance for a war and reinforce the system for combined operations.
					
					 These moves bring their aggressive nature to bolder relief.
					
					 The U.S.-Japan-south Korea joint military exercises are going on in an unbroken chain within the framework of the alliance.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces are busy staging various strike drills with huge forces involved with the U.S. forces. Japan is offering its territory to the U.S. as a relay base and operational and logistic bases.
					
					 The Japan-south Korea missile defence system with the U.S. as an axis is in the making. 
					
					 This goes to prove that the triangular military alliance is fully ready to go operational for a war any time.
					
					 Huan Qiu Shibao of China in its editorial said that the south Korea-Japan military agreement is aimed at strengthening the triangular military alliance but, in actually, targets against China though it ostensively aims at the DPRK.
					
					 The military nexus among the U.S., Japan and south Korea is absolutely unpardonable as it further aggravates the situation not only on the Korean Peninsula but in the rest of Northeast Asia.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams S. Korean Traitors' Frantic Purchase of U.S.-made Weapons
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams S. Korea's Planned Purchase of U.S.-made Weapons
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The moves of the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea to purchase U.S.-made weapons are touching off bitter anger among south Korean people from all walks of life.
					 The Lee group set it as its "top-priority task of the administration" before the end of the tenure of its office this year to clinch with the U.S. the contract on the purchase of U.S.-made weapons worth more than ten billion dollars.
					
					 It requested the U.S. to sell weapons worth more than 1.409 billion dollars for the present, including multi-purpose helicopters, missiles and ultra-modern guided missiles.
					
					 The group went the lengths of contemplating introducing even fighters still in the process of development within its term of office by concluding the assessment of them through simulation flight, not through test flight.
					
					 It has so far bought deadly weapons and hardware worth tens of billions of dollars from the U.S. since it took office.
					
					 This is six times the number of the weaponry purchased by the former "governments" in the corresponding period.
					
					 Such move of the Lee group is a reckless act of escalating military confrontation in Northeast Asia including the Korean Peninsula, sparking off arms race and straining the situation.
					
					 The amount of money the Lee group is spending for the purchase of U.S.-made weapons is enough to provide jobs to 5.2 million unemployed and underemployed people and relieve at least 9.22 million poor people unable to earn even the minimum living cost and distribute houses to more than 9.315 million families, half of all families in south Korea.
					
					 This is also huge enough to pay school expenses for the south Korean students who are demanding the cut of registration fee by half, to say nothing of all schoolchildren.
					
					 The Lee group is a clan of wicked traitors and charlatans who rob the people of their money, utterly indifferent to their fate, and offer it to their American master and get profits through this.
					
					 The projected purchase betrayed once again the true colors of Lee as a traitor keen to prolong his dirty remaining days as a pro-U.S. stooge by selling off the interests of the nation and to meet its own interests.
					
					 It is quit natural for all south Koreans to condemn the Lee group's projected purchase as an act of treachery doing harm to the nation and deteriorating the people's living.

articles.title: MBC Derides Confidants of Lee Myung Bak Going to Ruin
articles.content:
MBC Derides Confidants of Lee Myung Bak Going to Ruin 
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- MBC (Munhwa Broadcasting Corporation) of south Korea Tuesday ridiculed traitor Lee Myung Bak's confidants going to ruin owing to their involvement in various scandals.
					 It said:
					
					 There were heavyweights called "six-man society" which was behind the installing of the Lee "government". Its core members including Lee Sang Duk, Choe Si Jung and Pak Hui Thae are now under investigation by prosecution.
					
					 The society, which included Lee Myung Bak, was the highest decision-making body organized within the "Grand National Party" at the time of "the presidential election" in 2007.
					
					 The members of the society have propped up the regime, holding leading posts in the "government", "the National Assembly" and the ruling party since Lee came to power.
					
					 Former lawmaker Lee Sang Duk, in particular, exercised such strong power that there were phraseologies of "everything through elder brother and "senior minister."
					
					 Choe Si Jung, former chairman of the Broadcasting and Communication Committee, exercised his enormous influence over the broadcasting and communication policy, being called "boss of a large army of broadcasting and communication personnel" while Pak Hui Thae, former speaker of the "18th National Assembly", controlled the field of legislation, holding the post of representative of the ruling party.
					
					 However, all of them are going downhill after facing legal actions.
					
					 Lee Sang Duk was summoned to prosecution on July 3 and Choe Si Jung was arrested in May.
					
					 Pak Hui Thae was sentenced to a stay of execution in June owing to the distribution of enveloped money during the congress of the ruling party.
					
					 Lee's young confidants including Pak Yong Jun, former vice-minister of Knowledge-based Economy, were detained or ousted one after another. Consequently, the Lee "government's" ruling crisis is likely to further deepen with six months before its fall.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Website of British Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Website of British Organization
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The full text of the work of the dear respected Kim Jong Un "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People" was carried on the internet website of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on June 28.
					 The work, issued on April 20, 2012, deals with the revolutionary feats Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed in their lifetime.
					
					 It sets forth the tasks for resolutely safeguarding and glorifying their idea and feats for all ages.

articles.title: WPK Is Party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il: Media
articles.content:
WPK Is Party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il: Media
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Newspapers and radios of Russia, Ethiopia, Uruguay and Guinea carried special write-ups to mark the 48th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The Russian paper Nakhodkinski Rabochi on June 19 carried a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The paper in an article titled "WPK is the party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il" said Kim Jong Il conducted all the Party work strictly based on the Juche idea and developed it into a revolutionary party that achieved unity in thinking and will and in terms of moral obligation.
					
					 The harmonious whole of the party and popular masses is one of his feats, the paper said.
					
					 The Ethiopian paper Daily Monitor on June 14 carried an article illustrated with photos of Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un which lauded the great contribution Kim Jong Il made to developing the WPK for decades.
					
					 The Uruguayan paper La Juventud on June 16 said the Juche idea being recognized by the international community as the guiding idea of the human cause of independence would be unthinkable without Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It is natural to call their revolutionary idea Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the paper said.
					
					 The Guinean radio on June 18 elaborated on how Kim Jong Il consolidated single-mined unity of whole society as firm as a rock and led the revolution and construction with its might.
					
					 International radio and radios of seven national languages of Guinea aired the same contents.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats in War Victory Praised by Russian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats in War Victory Praised by Russian Paper
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The Russian paper Patriot No. 24 carried a special article praising the feats President Kim Il Sung performed in the war victory. It carried his photo making a radio speech to all the Korean people.
					 The victory of the Korean people in the Korean War was a victory of the revolutionary people over the imperialist reactionary forces and a victory of the revolutionary army over the imperialist armed forces for aggression, the article said.
					
					 It exposed the U.S. imperialists' war provocation and said the Korean people achieved the brilliant victory under the wise leadership of the President.
					
					 Introducing popular heroism and matchless self-sacrificing spirit displayed by the army and people of the DPRK, it went on:
					
					 The Korean people won the great victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. Though it was small in its territory, the DPRK defeated the imperialist allied forces. The myth of the "mightiness" of U.S. imperialism was shattered to smithereens in the Korean War.
					
					 The President led the Fatherland Liberation War to victory and leader Kim Jong Il won victory in confrontation with imperialism.  This great tradition is being successfully carried forward by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: U.S. Accused of Arms Buildup against DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Accused of Arms Buildup against DPRK 
						
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Russian organizations and a regional organization issued statements on June 24 to denounce the U.S. imperialists for having stepped up massive arms buildup and staged madcap military exercises against the DPRK.
					 The Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and All-Russian Society for the Study and Dissemination of Kimilsungism in a joint statement said that the U.S. is becoming all the more undisguised in its moves for aggression such as joint military exercises involving Japan and south Korea. This resulted in extremely aggravating the situation on the Korean Peninsula, it added. This is a wanton violation of the Korean Armistice Agreement and an open provocation against the DPRK, the statement said, calling upon the world progressive people to positively support the Korean people in their struggle against the U.S. moves for aggression, rallied close around the dear respected Kim Jong Un. The Russian groups for the study of the Juche idea and the Songun idea fully support the line of the DPRK and demand the provocateurs stop at once the acts against it, the statement noted.
					
					 The Russian Society for Promoting the Study and Dissemination of Comrade Kim Jong Il's Works, Kim Jong Suk Women's Union of Russia, Russian Youth Association for the Study of the Songun Policy and the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions also issued a joint statement.
					
					 It warned that the U.S. should clearly know its provocations would trigger due reaction of the service personnel of the Korean People's Army who are united close behind Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The provocateurs set to ignite a new war against the DPRK by instigating the south Korean puppet group will face defeat, the statement noted, calling upon all the honest people of the world to support the peace-loving line of Kim Jong Un, denounce the U.S. provocation moves and turn out in the struggle against war arsonists and aggressors.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige en el terreno el aeropuerto de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige en el terreno el aeropuerto de Pyongyang
						
Pyongyang, 5 de julio (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el Aeropuerto de Pyongyang.
					  El Dirigente Kim Jong Il dijo en agosto del ano pasado que hay que modernizar el Aeropuerto de Pyongyang e instruyo preparar bien la obra para terminar la construccion del edificio no. 1 del aeropuerto con motivo del centenario de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung. 
					
					El maximo dirigente recorrio el interior y el exterior del edificio no.1 recien construido con una superficie arquitectonica de mil 729 metros cuadrados.
					
					  El edificio esta acondicionado para que aseguren los servicios de calidad a los viajeros.
					
					   Kim Jong Un se puso muy complacido de que los constructores militares hayan edificado ese moderno edificio en un corto plazo.
					
					  Examino atentamente la pared exterior del edificio hecha principalmente con el cristal combinandolo con las piedras refinadas de granito y las pulidas y el basamento acabado con las piedras de primer tipo. 
					
					Califico de buena la calidad de ejecucion de la obra mirando las piedras artificiales de gran tamano pegadas en el hall central y la pared del corredor, el suelo azulejado y el adorno hecho en el techo para la iluminacion auxiliar.
					
					  Al recorrer sala por sala, vio que las aranas de gemas, las redondas y la lampara indirecta estan colocadas armoniosamente segun los usos de esos cuartos.
					
					Acto seguido, escucho la explicacion sobre el edificio no.2 a construirse y dio preciosas instrucciones para acondicionar la terminal aerea a las alturas del nuevo siglo.
					
					Asigno la tarea de acondicionar comodamente la salida de viajeros y las salas de espera para evitar que se confluyan los viajantes que salen y llegan.
					
					Al ver el diseno del edificio no.2, corrigio los errores diciendo que el primer piso y el segundo deben parecer bien diferentes a la vista para poner de relieve el perfil del edificio y eliminar su monotonia.
					
					Hay que acondicionar bien tambien la zona de Sunan como ciudad satelite, puerta y rostro de Pyongyang, destaco.
					
					El aeropuerto de Pyongyang debe operar las lineas internacionales y las nacionales tambien, por eso debe renovar su contenido y forma arquitectonica conforme a su capacidad para que adquiera la figura de terminal aerea de la patria socialista, acoto.
					
					Es preciso acondicionar bien este aeropuerto, que tiene los edificios y las instalaciones necesarias al aterrizaje y despegue seguros y exactos, y la torre de control de la zona, senalo.
					
					El Aeropuerto de Pyongyang es creacion monumental de eterna duracion y por eso, hay que construirlo en el maximo nivel, apunto y reitero que aseguren la calidad en la obra planeada.
					
					Luego, Kim Jong Un paso revista al avion de pasajeros no. 633 y el avion no. 535 usado por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					A bordo del primer avion, se cercioro de sus especificaciones tecnicas y su operacion.
					
					En el segundo, dio ensenanzas para conservar, mantener y operar bien ese avion.

articles.title: Ro Su Hui cruza linea divisoria de Phanmunjom
articles.content:
Ro Su Hui cruza linea divisoria de Phanmunjom
						
Pyongyang, 5 de julio (ACNC) -- Ro Su Hui, vicepresidente de la Direccion Surena de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APRP), volvio este jueves al Sur de Corea cruzando la linea de Phanmunjom que divide a Corea en el Norte y el Sur.
					Ro vino a Pyongyang el 24 de marzo para tomar parte en el acto de condolencias por el 100o dia de fallecimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Le acompanaron hasta Phanmunjom Choe Jin Su, presidente de la Direccion Nortena de la APRP, y los miembros de las direcciones nortenas de la APRP, la Alianza Pannacional de la Juventud y los Estudiantes por la Reunificacion de la Patria y el comite norteno para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio.
					
					Estuvieron congregados en Phanmunjom los trabajadores de diversos estratos, jovenes y estudiantes de la ciudad de Kaesong para despedir a Ro.
					
					Cuando Ro llego al patio frente al Pabellon Phanmun, la multitud lo recibio con hospitalidad agitando las banderas de reunificacion.
					
					Una estudiante le obsequio un ramo de flores.
					
					El vicepresidente intercambio saludos de despedida con los miembros de las entidades norcoreanas arriba mencionadas.
					
					A las 15:00, Ro paso la linea divisoria portando una bandera de reunificacion. 
					
					Unos agentes vestidos de civil se abalanzaron sobre el y se precipitaron a llevarlo por la fuerza.
					
					Desde el otro lado de la linea, los habitantes norcoreanos estimularon a Ro Su Hui gritando "!Abajo la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak!", "!Dejen abierto el camino a Ro Su Hui quien regresa a su casa!" y "!Que Estados Unidos y las autoridades conservadoras surcoreanas cesen de inmediato los actos antieticos de impedir el camino del vicepresidente Ro Su Hui!"
					
					La conducta loable de Ro, quien visito a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea para expresar condolencias con motivo de los 100 dias de fallecimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y contribuir al cumplimiento de la causa de reunificacion de la patria, escribio una pagina indeleble en la historia del movimiento nacional por la reunificacion.

articles.title: Texto integro de la rueda de prensa concedida por Pak Jong Suk (6)
articles.content:
Texto integro de la rueda de prensa concedida por Pak Jong Suk (6)
						
Pyongyang, 5 de julio (ACNC) -- En la conferencia de prensa concedida el 28 de junio con los medios nacionales y extranjeros, Pak Jong Suk, quien habia sido raptada por la banda de titeres surcoreanos y llevada al Sur de Corea, expuso su sentimiento de haber regresado al regazo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					La patria madre ofrecio agua vivificadora a mi caidos en el abismo por culpa mia.
					
					Me quede atonita cuando los funcionarios concernientes me recibieron calurosamente en el aeropuerto, porque no tenia el derecho a replicar aunque me pusieran esposas.
					
					Por la noche de ese dia, contemplando el cielo nocturno de Pyongyang pense mucho en que es tan afectuosa y generosa la patria y que no tenia otra palabra aunque me muriera ahora mismo. 
					
					 Hasta entonces no imagine cuan grandioso amor y benevolencia me esperaban a mi.
					
					Sin reprochar de mi pasado lleno de crimenes, el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un me ofrecio inmenso amor y favor.
					
					Tomo medidas para que yo viviera en Pyongyang junto con mi hijo que trabaja de profesor en el Conservatorio Kim Won Gyun de Pyongyang.
					
					Soy una criminal ingrata que habia abandonado la patria para buscar una vida mas rica cuando otros se empenaban por construir un Estado prospero apretando el cinturon.
					
					Para dar saludo de agradecimiento al Maximo Dirigente, quien me dio renacimiento, fui a las estatuas de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il erguidas en la colina Mansu.
					
					Hice penitencia sobre mi pasado y tome la firme decision de apoyar con sinceridad al Maximo Dirigente.
					
					No existe en este mundo el gran hombre como el Maximo Dirigente.
					
					Gracias a el igual a los grandes Generalisimos yo naci otra vez.

articles.title: Firmado plan de cooperacion entre RPDC y Vietnam
articles.content:
Firmado plan de cooperacion entre RPDC y Vietnam
						
Pyongyang, 5 de julio (ACNC) -- Quedo rubricado el dia 3 en Hanoi el plan de colaboracion en la rama de estandarizacion, medicion y administracion de calidad para el periodo 2012-2013 entre el Comite Estatal de Control de la Calidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Direccion de Estandar y Calidad de Vietnam de la Republica Socialista de Vietnam.
					Estuvieron presentes en la ceremonia de firmas los miembros de la delegacion del mencionado comite coreano encabezada por su presidente Choe Kwang Rae y el consejero economico-comercial de la embajada coreana en Vietnam, por la parte coreana, y por la vietnamita, Ngo Quy Viet, director general de la mencionada direccion, y otras personalidades interesadas.
					
					Suscribieron el documento Choe Kwang Rae y Ngo Quy Viet.
